price: 58. Waxaanu kuula iman sixir la mid ah ee noo qabo ballan dhexdeenna aan ku kulanno, oo aanaan ka dib dhaceyn innaga iyo adiguba midna meel fagaare ah9.
arabic: فَلَنَأۡتِيَنَّكَ بِسِحۡرٖ مِّثۡلِهِۦ فَٱجۡعَلۡ بَيۡنَنَا وَبَيۡنَكَ مَوۡعِدٗا لَّا نُخۡلِفُهُۥ نَحۡنُ وَلَآ أَنتَ مَكَانٗا سُوٗى
footnotes: 9. Meel cayiman si loo ogaado, macno kale waa meel noo dhexeysa ee la isugu yimaado ama meel fagaare ah oo siman.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: falanatiyannaka bisiḥ'rin mith'lihi fa-ij'ʿal baynanā wabaynaka mawʿidan lā nukh'lifuhu naḥnu walā anta makānan suwan
translations: Then we will surely produce for you
